channel.title: dvb on James Tombleson
channel.description: Recent content in dvb on James Tombleson

item.title: dbv Alpha Release
item.description: So, last month one of my Linux servers failed and I was unable to recover the VM. I was lucky that the data cared about stored on a mobile device! Of my containers, the one running my webdav instance was the one I didnt want to lose any data. With that scare, I wanted to address my backup solution, or lack of. So one thing I wanted to do was build a new tool to backup my docker data.
